languages.text: The Mastiff has double MP if {g|f:78e7771b7c974111887e762d5e999a11}Protect!{/g} is used on the Overseer.

traits.locale_text: The Mastiff has double MP if {g|f:78e7771b7c974111887e762d5e999a11}Protect!{/g} is used on the Overseer.

languages.text: If {g|f:78e7771b7c974111887e762d5e999a11}Protect!{/g} is used on the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}, the cyber-mastiff's {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} is doubled when moving to them.
languages.original_text: Если способность {g|f:78e7771b7c974111887e762d5e999a11}Охранять!{/g} применена к {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}надзирателю{/g}, его кибермастиф перемещается к нему с удвоенным запасом {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g}.

traits.locale_text: If {g|f:78e7771b7c974111887e762d5e999a11}Protect!{/g} is used on the Overseer, when moving to them, the cyber-mastiff has its number of MP doubled.

languages.text: Si se usa {g|f:78e7771b7c974111887e762d5e999a11}¡Protege!{/g} con el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}supervisor{/g}, los {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} del cibermastín se duplican cuando se mueve hacia él.
languages.original_text: If {g|f:78e7771b7c974111887e762d5e999a11}Protect!{/g} is used on the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}, the cyber-mastiff's {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} is doubled when moving to them.

traits.locale_text: Si se usa {g|f:78e7771b7c974111887e762d5e999a11}¡Protege!{/g} con el supervisor, los PM del cibermastín se duplican cuando se mueve hacia él.

languages.text: 如果{g|f:78e7771b7c974111887e762d5e999a11}守护！{/g}的对象为监察官，则生化獒犬在向{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}监察官{/g}移动的过程中，{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}翻倍。
languages.original_text: If {g|f:78e7771b7c974111887e762d5e999a11}Protect!{/g} is used on the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}, the cyber-mastiff's {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} is doubled when moving to them.

traits.locale_text: 如果{g|f:78e7771b7c974111887e762d5e999a11}守护！{/g}的对象为监察官，则生化獒犬在向监察官移动的过程中，移动点数翻倍。

languages.text: Wenn {g|f:78e7771b7c974111887e762d5e999a11}Beschütze!{/g} auf den {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Aufseher{/g} benutzt wird, werden die {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} des Cyber-Mastiffs auf dem Weg dorthin verdoppelt.
languages.original_text: If {g|f:78e7771b7c974111887e762d5e999a11}Protect!{/g} is used on the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}, the cyber-mastiff's {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} is doubled when moving to them.

traits.locale_text: Wenn {g|f:78e7771b7c974111887e762d5e999a11}Beschütze!{/g} auf den Aufseher benutzt wird, werden die BP des Cyber-Mastiffs auf dem Weg dorthin verdoppelt.

languages.text: Si la capacité {g|f:78e7771b7c974111887e762d5e999a11}Protège !{/g} est utilisée sur le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}surveillant{/g}, les {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} du cyber-mastiff sont doublés lorsqu'il essaie de le rejoindre.
languages.original_text: If {g|f:78e7771b7c974111887e762d5e999a11}Protect!{/g} is used on the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}, the cyber-mastiff's {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} is doubled when moving to them.

traits.locale_text: Si la capacité {g|f:78e7771b7c974111887e762d5e999a11}Protège !{/g} est utilisée sur le surveillant, les PD du cyber-mastiff sont doublés lorsqu'il essaie de le rejoindre.

languages.text: {g|f:78e7771b7c974111887e762d5e999a11}守れ！{/g}が{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}監督者{/g}に使用されると、監督者に向かって移動する際サイバーマスチフの{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}は2倍になる。
